results.title: Brazil’s election officials demand answers for police stops of buses carrying voters.
results.abstract: There were dozens of reports on social media on Sunday that federal highway agents were stopping vehicles and questioning people in several states across Brazil.

multimedia.caption: Alexandre de Moraes, a Supreme Court justice who leads Brazil’s election agency, issued an order to the Brazil’s federal highway police chief, calling on him to provide proof that his officers were not violating election rules.

results.title: A ‘Sea of Bodies’: How a Festive Night in Seoul Turned Deadly
results.abstract: There were few police officers around as a mass of revelers swelled. From within the crowd came calls to “push, push” and a big shove, according to witnesses. Then, they began to fall.

results.title: The ‘Slow Burn’ That Is Henry Taylor

org_facet: Los Angeles Museum of Contemporary Art

multimedia.caption: Henry Taylor at his studio on Jefferson Boulevard in Los Angeles, dedicated to his sculptural practice.
